kotuwa dumriya sthanaye dumriya sthana adhikari lesa sunil palliyage mahatha (02)dina sita pathkota atha.kotuwa dumriya sthanaye nidana madiri wenkirime sthanadhipathi lesa wasara dekakata wadi kalayak sewaya kala palliyage mahatha .wadduwa,lunawa, thambauththegama wani dumriya sthanawala wasara gananak dumriya sthanadhipathi lesa sewaya sewaya kota atha.kotuwa dumriya sthana adhikari lesa methek sewaya kala em.el chandrasoma mahatha wishrama giyeya. 1975 wasare sahakara dumriya sthanadhipathi lesa dumriya departhumenthuwata badunu chandrasoma mahatha nanumbaaya dumriya sthanayen siya rajakari aarambha kota thibina.pura wasara hathalihak dumriya dumriya departhumenthuwe sewaya kala ee mahatha wasara dahayakata wadi kalayak kotuwa dumriya sthana adhikari lesa sewaya kota wishrama giyeya.chandrasoma mahathage wishrama yamath samanga purappaduwu ema thanathura sunil palliyage mahatha pathkota atha.
